attributes.action: Bring Back the Bronkie in the Workplace
attributes.additional_details:
The signatories demand the reinstatement of Bronkie availability for the workforce at a large West London office facility.

The Bronkie has been removed from the coffee bar without consultation, in spite of excessive demand for the product and the positive affect of having a daily Resilience Bronkie has had on the workforce.

Bring Back the Bronkie
